mapper.select: SELECT h.biz_type AS bizType, h.biz_id AS bizId, CASE WHEN h.biz_type = 1 THEN q.title WHEN h.biz_type = 2 THEN kb.title WHEN h.biz_type = 3 THEN t.title ELSE CONCAT('CONTENT#', h.biz_id) END AS title, CASE WHEN h.biz_type = 1 THEN LEFT(q.content, 80) WHEN h.biz_type = 2 THEN kb.summary WHEN h.biz_type = 3 THEN t.subtitle ELSE '' END AS subTitle, h.created_at AS viewedAt FROM user_browse_history h LEFT JOIN qa_question q ON h.biz_type = 1 AND q.id = h.biz_id LEFT JOIN kb_entry kb ON h.biz_type = 2 AND kb.id = h.biz_id LEFT JOIN qa_topic t ON h.biz_type = 3 AND t.id = h.biz_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.created_at DESC, h.id DESC
